item.title: Lower Cargo Compartment Fire Extinguisher System – Bottles (C&D) or (C, D, E & F) Lower Cargo Compartment Distribution Networks – Empty Cargo Handling Equipment Only – Both Networks Inoperative

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided procedures are established and used to verify lower cargo compartments remain empty, or contain only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULDs), or Fly Away Kits.

note.para: UPS does not carry Fly Away Kits in voided cargo compartments.

numlitem.para: Lower cargo compartments remain empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment.

placard.para: Placard near discharge switch on fire control module located on the pilots overhead panel: "BOTTLE _____ INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
